title: Pediatric Ophthalmology Clinical Guideline Development and Validation Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ophthalmic diagnostic skills and experience in handling pediatric patients
context.additional_context: Parallel implementation of theory learning and practical simulations using digital devices, including expert feedback sessions.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design pediatric ophthalmology clinical guides by applying the ADDIE model.
Learners can evaluate the content validity of educational materials through expert validation processes.
Learners can accurately perform step-by-step procedures in pediatric ophthalmology screenings, including visual acuity tests, ocular motility assessments, and color vision tests.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
